other_tests.findings: Increased tracer uptake in the medial aspect of the right femoral shaft (SUVmax = 13.3), suggesting recurrent osteosarcoma.
Increased tracer uptake in the medial aspect of the right femoral shaft, indicating possible recurrent osteosarcoma.
Histology showed osteoid production and hypercellular spindle cell proliferation without pleomorphism or cellular atypia, suggesting florid reactive periostitis ossificans.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At 9-month follow-up, there was no recurrence or metastasis.
